title: Fully Unleashed And BloodLust (Part 3)
body:
Fully Unleashed And BloodLust (Part 3)

Kazil's face turned pale when all the Wyverns launched their attacks on him at the same time.

Although he was an S rank hunter and Wyverns were just A rank, the attacks of nineteen Wyverns combined gave him a strong feeling of dread.

The sky was illuminated by different kinds of elements. Fire, Water, Sand, Earth, Crystal all kinds of attack were coming towards him.

"Sh-shadow steps" Kazil hastily used one of his skills and quickly moved away from the place he was standing.

Just as he moved away, all the attacks launched by Wyverns reached the ground.

BOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!

Rumble!!!

The floor of the dungeon shook and the brunt ground crumbled. A giant mushroom cloud rose high in the sky and shockwaves swept in all directions.

Kazil appeared five hundred meters away from the place he was standing and hurriedly created a dark shield around him.

Bang!
